resources.string: Thanks for adding a new entity. It might take about 30 minutes to do the complete analysis. However, you may check the interim results, as and when they are ready
We studied over thousands of Tweets related to the mentioned topic spread across the country. Used Machine Learning to analyse the sentiment of the Tweet and calculate a final score
Directly proportional to the number of Tweets
People are tweeting negative things about the topic
People are tweeting positive things about the topic
Mixed opinions. A large black circle means that area is comprised of both positive and negative people.
